author: @cp24
title: Toronto-area hospitals welcome 5 leap day babies | CP24.com
text: Two Toronto-area hospitals welcomed five leap day babies on Thursday, Feb. 29. Trillium Health Partners, which operates Credit Valley Hospital where the babies were delivered, shared images of the bundles of joy who were born on the rare date. â€œFeb. 29, also known as Leap Day, only comes around once every four years, which makes for a very unique birthdate,â€ the hospital network, which also runs Mississauga Hospital and the Queensway Health Centre, said in a post on social media. A leap year typically occurs quadrennially because of the 365.24 days it takes the earth to orbit the sun. An extra day is added in February to account for the built up time over those four years and to keep the calendar in sync. Meanwhile, at the Distillery District in downtown Toronto, there was a party for adults celebrating their Feb. 29 birthday â€“ with free drinks and food for those with ID to prove it. Arne, who is around 76 years old, celebrated the 19th anniversary of his birth date on Thursday. â€œThis is my 19th birth day. Not my 19th birthday. My 19th birth day. So, Iâ€™m now legal drinking age,â€ he said with a smile. Arne is one of 25,000 Canadians born on Feb.29, according to the 2019 census. â€œYou know why there is a Feb. 29? Because it takes an entire year to explain what a leap year is,â€ he laughed.

author: Fernando de Lama
title: La DANA roza Ibiza y la Aemet sube la alerta a naranja
text: La DANA que ha golpeado en los Ãºltimos dÃ­as todo el litoral mediterrÃ¡neo espaÃ±ol sigue activa y en las Ãºltimas horas se ha situado en el mar al norte de la isla. Aemet ha elevado la alerta amarilla a naranja porque se prevÃ©n episodios de alrededor de 50 litros por metro cuadrado en una hora. El riesgo naranja permanecerÃ¡ activo hasta las 20 horas de este viernes dÃ­a festivo de Tots Sants. Las lluvias han descargado con fuerza en algunos puntos de la isla desde primera hora de la maÃ±ana, ya que la tormenta ha barrido buena parte de la isla. Sobre todo en la zona norte, con chubascos potentes en la zona de Sant Vicent, Sant Joan y entre Santa AgnÃ¨s y Sant Mateu. Pero tambiÃ©n se han producido lluvias intensas en otros puntos, como el Pla de Sant Antoni, en Santa EulÃ ria hacia el interior e incluso en puntos aislados de Sant Josep y en la ciudad de Eivissa, donde se han producido algunas inundaciones. TambiÃ©n en las Ãºltimas horas se han producido tormentas en Formentera. Se recomienda no estar en zonas inundables ni utilizar las carreteras, ya que es un fenÃ³meno impredecible que puede descargar tormentas y provocar inundaciones en pocos minutos. Desde las 9 de la maÃ±ana tambiÃ©n han descargado decenas de rayos en diferentes puntos de la isla. Aunque el grueso de la DANA sigue afectando desde anoche principalmente a la zona de CastellÃ³n y el Sur de Tarragona, se ha ido desplazando hacia el MediterrÃ¡neo y un frente estÃ¡ situado durante toda la madrugada y la maÃ±ana entre Ibiza y Mallorca. Ante la emergencia meteorolÃ³gica para este dÃ­a de Tots Sants, el Govern balear ha reclamado â€œmÃ¡xima prudenciaâ€ a los ciudadanos â€œlas prÃ³ximas horas y dÃ­asâ€ por la alerta naranja decretada. Se recomienda que se tomen precauciones y mantenerse informado de la predicciÃ³n meteorolÃ³gica mÃ¡s actualizada. Las actividades habituales y al aire libre pueden verse alteradas. El Servicio de Emergencias 112 ha activado el Ãndice de Gravedad 1 (IG1) del Plan Meteobal por lluvias y tormentas en Ibiza, Formentera, Mallorca y Menorca.

author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text: NYE 2023 is on a unique date that occurs once every 100 years: Here's what 12/31/23 means. [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Yearâ€™s Eve date suggests. If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are [repeating number sequence](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/)s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from [000](/story/life/2022/11/30/angel-number-000-meaning/10589434002/) to [999](/story/life/2023/01/30/angel-number-999-meaning/10806425002/), with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/) The once-in-a-century date, which wonâ€™t be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to â€œtransform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,â€ [according to the Old Farmerâ€™s Almanac website. ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=123123&ref=cs_503_search), [eBay](https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2332490.m570.l1313&_nkw=123123&_sacat=0) and [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/market/123123?ref=seller_tag_bottom_image-1), the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network [reported.](/story/news/local/michigan/2023/12/27/angel-number-meaning-123123-last-day-year-numerology/72001298007/) Hereâ€™s what we know about the date. What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? [Numerology is an ancient esoteric science](https://www.britannica.com/topic/numerology) that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist [Novalee Wilder](https://www.novaleewilder.com/) shared with USA Today earlier this month. "Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count." The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number. Professional astrologer [Narayana MontÃºfar](https://www.naramon.com/) told [ Farmerâ€™s Almanac ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) that the â€œNumber 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.â€ If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12. The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and â€œahaâ€ moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated. FYI: [How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks](/story/graphics/2023/12/28/keep-dog-calm-new-years-eve-fireworks/71999504007/) What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches. A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the [Old Farmerâ€™s Almanac. ](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486) Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or [11:11](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/1111-good-luck-and-history), the website stated. Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the [Farmerâ€™s Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486): - 4/2/24 - 4/20/24 - 4/21/24 - 4/22/24 - 4/23/24 - 4/24/24 - 4/25/24 - 4/26/24 - 4/27/24 - 4/28/24 - 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today 30 famous Capricorns you should know: [These celebrities belong to the winter Zodiac sign](/story/entertainment/celebrities/2023/11/29/famous-people-that-are-capricorns/71489302007/)

author: December 5
title: Sunnybrook ranked one of Canadaâ€™s Top 10 Research Hospitals for 2024 - Sunnybrook Hospital
text:
Sunnybrook ranked one of Canadaâ€™s Top 10 Research Hospitals for 2024
Sunnybrook Research Institute (SRI) was ranked in the top 10 on the 2024 list of [Canadaâ€™s Top 40 Research Hospitals](https://researchinfosource.com/cil/2024/top-40-research-hospitals/list), released by RE$EARCH Infosource Inc. The list analyzes hospital-based research institutes on several metrics, including total funding.
This year, SRI maintained its standing at #9, with hospital research spending totalling more than $140M in the past fiscal year, an increase of 9.3% from the previous year. Under institution intensity, defined as research intensity as a percentage of total hospital spending, SRI ranked fourth with 9.8% intensity. For researcher intensity, used to measure income per scientist, SRI ranked 10th in the country with an average of $346K in expenditure per researcher.
The top 40 list scores hospitals across the country based on total research income in the previous fiscal year, as reported in the Canadian Research Hospitals Database. Funds that are considered include grants, contributions and contracts from government and non-government sources in the previous fiscal year.
View the complete list of [Canadaâ€™s Top 40 Research Hospitals](https://researchinfosource.com/cil/2024/top-40-research-hospitals/list).
